T02D3735:71b-0: @71b * // bee shra ba na'i rtogs pa bzhugs//
T02D3735:71b-2: # // dang por bdag nyid yi dam gyi ltar bskyed la /
T02D3735:71b-3: bcom lan 'das rnam thos sras seng ge la bcibs pa /
T02D3735:71b-4: mdog ser po lag na rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'bar ba thogs pa //
T02D3735:71b-5: gnod sbyin gyi bdag po brgyad kyis bskor ba /
T02D3735:71b-6: mdun na rmugs 'dzin rin po che thogs pa ser po /
T02D3735:71b-7: g-yas su gang ba bzang po bum pa thogs pa ser po /
T02D3735:71b-8: rgyab tu nor bu bzang po rin po che 'bar ba thogs pa dkar po /
T02D3735:71b-9: g-yon du rta bdag ku be ra lag na ral gri thogs pa nag po gos sngon po can /
T02D3735:71b-10: mtshams bzhir yang dag shes ser po lag na ral gri thogs pa /
T02D3735:71b-11: 'brog gnas lag na mdung thogs pa nag po //
T02D3735:71b-12: lnga rtsen ser skya lag na khang bu brtsegs pa bsnams pa /
T02D3735:71b-13: pi tsi kunda li lag na ral gri dang phub
T02D3735:71b-14: thogs pa dkar po de rnams rta la chibs pa
T02D3735:71b-15: / 'khor gnod sbyin bye bas bskor ba /
T02D3735:71b-16: lag na mtshon cha 'phyar ba bsams te /
T02D3735:71b-18: 'bras kyi phye'i dud pa btang la /
T02D3735:71b-19: dung dang rnga brdungs te spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02D3735:71b-20: aom bee shra ba na sa pa ri b'a ra badzra sa ma ya dza:h'um bam ho:/
T02D3735:71b-22: de mdun du byon pa'i rtags snying 'dar ba dang /
T02D3735:71b-25: mthong ba na bdug pa dang /
T02D3735:71b-27: gtor ma byin la phrin las bcol nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D3735:71b-28: sgron ma'i phyag rgya bcas la //
T02D3735:71b-29: aom sva bh'a ba bi shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a ba bi shuddhonya ham zhes brjod pas stong par bsam /
T02D3735:71b-30: de la gtor ma'i snod rin po che'i khang bu brtsegs pa dpag tshad kyi tshad tsam bsams la /
T02D3735:71b-31: de'i nang du lha'i zhal zas ro brgya bsams te /
T02D3735:71b-32: aom a'a:h'um gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D3735:71b-33: aom aa k'a ro zhes bya ba'i sngags lan bdun bzlas la /
T02D3735:71b-34: kha dog bzang po'i 'od dang bcas pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D3735:71b-36: aom bee shra wa na ye sr'a h'a /
T02D3735:71b-37: aom dzam bha la yi sv'a h'a /
T02D3735:71b-38: aom pu rna bha dra ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3735:71b-39: aom ma ni bha dra ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3735:71b-40: aom ku be ra ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3735:71b-41: aom sam pra dza na ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3735:71b-42: aom gu hya sta na ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3735:71b-43: aom panytsi ka ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3735:71b-44: aom pi tsi kunda li ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3735:71b-45: de rnams la zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod kyi phyin las bcol la /
T02D3735:72a-1: bee zhes yi ge sum cu tsa gnyis kyi tshad du gdon /
T02D3735:72a-2: nir ba tsa na bsreg pa bslab /
T02D3735:72a-3: par bar du gtor ma rgya chen po gtang /
T02D3735:72a-4: bee shra wa na'i rtogs pa rdzogs so /
T02D3735:72a-7: byang phyogs skyong ba'i rgyal chen rnam thos sras //
T02D3735:72a-8: gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes su gsol //
T02D3735:72a-9: 'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan //
T02D3735:72a-10: sde bo che la stobs po che //
T02D3735:72a-11: pha rol dgra rnams 'joms par byed //
T02D3735:72a-12: gzhan gyis mi thub drag shul che //
T02D3735:72a-14: kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan //
T02D3735:72a-15: bdag nyid chen po de dag la //
T02D3735:72a-16: mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D3735:72a-17: byang phyogs skyong ba'i rgyal chen rnam thos sras //
T02D3735:72a-18: phyag na rdo rje'i bka' nyan dam tshig can //
T02D3735:72a-19: rig pas byin rlabs nam mkha'i mthas klas pa'i //
T02D3735:72a-20: 'dod yon lda bcas gtor ma bul ba bzhes //
T02D3735:72a-21: sras dang btsun mo gnyen dang dam ga dpung bcas //
T02D3735:72a-22: 'di dag dgongs shing 'go bar gyur nas kyang //
T02D3735:72a-23: sngon gyi thugs dam phrin las ma bsnyel bar //
